reviewText: Awesome Blu-Rays that deliver superior picture and sound.  It is truly like being on the ride in the front seat!  You will get to experience roller coasters from all over the world that includes many in the USA.  Glad I added this to my collection.  Can't wait for the other volumes to be released on Blu-Ray.  Great job to Robb Alvey in his team to creating these Blu-Rays!  I live in Ohio..have rode roller coasters at Kings Island and Cedar Point.  Get these Blu-Rays for the ultimate roller coaster experience!

Roller Coasters in the Raw HD: Triple Pack Vol 1, 2, 3I was mesmerized with the Clear Full HD captured with no music but True Sound of the Costers. I would strongly recommend this Blu Ray for All Roller Coster Arden Fan Out There! A MUST to owned this Blu Ray and it somehow bring back the adrenaline on some of those rides even by watching this Full HD Blu Ray! You will also learnt the locality of this coster and brief description of the respective costers. AWESOME Work Guys and I cant wait for another series to be release on Full HD Blu Ray! Thank You Very Much and Keep Up With The Good Work Guys!
Very cool BluRay disc set! I think they did a great job of filming these actual roller coaster rides from all over the world!

From the stats about each coaster to the high def. footage itself; this is a truly unique blu-ray that you won't find anywhere else. Worth getting shipped to the UK for myself without a doubt. Really well made and coaster fan pleasing product!

The blu ray war great. The best roller coaster dvd/blu ray what i've ever saw. Thank you Robb
Greetings from Germany  (Berlin)
This is almost as good as actually riding these coasters themselves.  The footage is great!  It does not have any of that usual shakiness that you see other other coaster videos.

The quality on these videos is amazing!  You cannot find as high a quality video anywhere!  The filming is incredible, and the 'steadiness' is amazing!  Even if you own the DVD versions of some of these coaster, you MUST get this version.  Watching the 1080p versions of the coasters on a big screen TV is beyond amazing.  It's as if your looking through a window!  Great stuff, can't wait for more releases!

You will *NOT* find anything like this online.. this footage knocks your socks off and looks AMAZING on your HD TV!  This has got a great selection of coasters and is such a value for the amount of footage that you get.  Theme Park Review really has knocked it out of the park with this one!
